page.title: 19GOBOWEN WOMEN'S INSTITUTE
page.content: One or two visitors and prospective members were included in a good attendance at the April meeting of {Gobowen Women's Institute,}when final arrangements were made for our coffee evening on April 29th. The handicraft competition was held during the afternoon, and wasjudged for us by Mrs Audrey Barrett. The Hilda Evelyn Fox Memorial Cup was won by Mrs J. Marvin, with Mrs N. Jones becond, and Mrs F. Pickles third. Our speaker and demonstrator for the evening was Mr R.Sweet of Whittington, who gave a short talk on his hobby, enamelled jewellery. Mr Sweet then invited us all to join in and make an article of jewellery for ourselves. There was a great response, and most of us went home wearing a pendant we had designed and (almost!) made ourselves.{Local news sheet report
